attributes.name: summary
attributes.value: A new model called Gemini 2.5 Computer Use has been introduced, designed to enhance AI's interaction with user interfaces, available in preview through an API.

attributes.name: summary
attributes.value: AI-driven interactive toys are gaining popularity in both China and the US, as companies equip children’s stuffed animals with chatbots and voice assistants, allowing toys to communicate with kids.

attributes.name: summary
attributes.value: OpenAI's newly launched Sora app offers a TikTok-like experience featuring exclusively AI-generated videos, enabling users to create personalized 'cameo' clips of themselves.

attributes.name: summary
attributes.value: CodeMender has been introduced as an AI agent focused on securing and patching software vulnerabilities, while event-driven architecture is highlighted for enabling real-time responsiveness in applications.
